trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> operation can be used to update automatic scaling settings for deployments of Cloud Services, Virtual Machines, Websites, and Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> operation can be used to update automatic scaling settings for deployments of Cloud Services, Virtual Machines, Websites, and Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has web roles or worker roles deployed to it.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has web roles or worker roles deployed to it.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for a role in the production or staging deployment environments for the specified cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for a role in the production or staging deployment environments for the specified cloud service.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the names of cloud services in your subscription, see <externalLink><linkText>List Hosted Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460781.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the names of cloud services in your subscription, see <externalLink><linkText>List Hosted Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460781.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding role names, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding role names, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has Virtual Machines deployed to it.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has Virtual Machines deployed to it.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;availability-set%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the availability set in which the Virtual Machines are a member.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;availability-set%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the availability set in which the Virtual Machines are a member.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for an availability set of Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for an availability set of Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the name of an availability set in which a Virtual Machine is a member, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the name of an availability set in which a Virtual Machine is a member, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for Websites.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for Websites.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace and replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;serverfarm%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the server farm in that webspace.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace and replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;serverfarm%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the server farm in that webspace.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for a server farm in a webspace.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for a server farm in a webspace.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the names of webspaces, see <externalLink><linkText>List Webspaces</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn166961.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the names of webspaces, see <externalLink><linkText>List Webspaces</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn166961.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the names of server farms, see <externalLink><linkText>Create, Manage, or Delete a Server Farm</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn194277.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the names of server farms, see <externalLink><linkText>Create, Manage, or Delete a Server Farm</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn194277.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobileservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Mobile Service.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobileservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Mobile Service.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for a Mobile Service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be updated for a Mobile Service.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods.
trans-unit.target: Contains a collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods.

trans-unit.source: A maximum of 20 autoscale profiles can be specified.
trans-unit.target: A maximum of 20 autoscale profiles can be specified.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the specified role.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the specified role.

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods.
trans-unit.target: Contains a collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the profile.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the profile.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of instances that can be used in the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of instances that can be used in the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Contains a collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: A maximum of 10 rules can be specified.
trans-unit.target: A maximum of 10 rules can be specified.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the frequency and schedule for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the frequency and schedule for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: This element is not used if the FixedDate element is used.
trans-unit.target: This element is not used if the FixedDate element is used.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a specific date for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a specific date for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: This element is not used if the Recurrence element is used.
trans-unit.target: This element is not used if the Recurrence element is used.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of instances that can be used in the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of instances that can be used in the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the minimum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of instances is limited by the cores that are available in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of instances is limited by the cores that are available in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Management Portal to see the number of cores that are available in your subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Management Portal to see the number of cores that are available in your subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of instances that are available for scaling if metrics are not available for evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of instances that are available for scaling if metrics are not available for evaluation.

trans-unit.source: The default is only used if the current instance count is lower than the default.
trans-unit.target: The default is only used if the current instance count is lower than the default.

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Contains a collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the metrics that are used to determine when a scaling action occurs.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the metrics that are used to determine when a scaling action occurs.

trans-unit.source: Specifies parameters for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies parameters for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the metrics that are used to determine when a scaling action occurs.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the metrics that are used to determine when a scaling action occurs.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the trigger.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the trigger.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a namespace identifier for the service in which the deployment is running.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a namespace identifier for the service in which the deployment is running.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">N:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Monitoring.Metrics</codeEntityReference> APIs to obtain the available metric namespace identifiers.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">N:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Monitoring.Metrics</codeEntityReference> APIs to obtain the available metric namespace identifiers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the resource to use for scaling by metrics.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the path to the resource to use for scaling by metrics.

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for cloud services:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for cloud services:

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloud-service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> depending on the environment in which the deployment is running, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloud-service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> depending on the environment in which the deployment is running, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for scaling by the depth of a queue:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for scaling by the depth of a queue:

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for scaling by metrics that are available in the Management Portal for storage accounts:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for scaling by metrics that are available in the Management Portal for storage accounts:

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for scaling by the return value of an API:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for scaling by the return value of an API:

trans-unit.source: For all storage resource paths, replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-account%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the storage account where the resource is located.
trans-unit.target: For all storage resource paths, replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-account%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the storage account where the resource is located.

trans-unit.source: Where appropriate, replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;queue%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the queue or replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>table</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>queue</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>blob</languageKeyword> depending on your needs.
trans-unit.target: Where appropriate, replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;queue%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the queue or replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>table</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>queue</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>blob</languageKeyword> depending on your needs.

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for deployments of Service Bus:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for deployments of Service Bus:

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;servicebus-namespace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the namespace of the service bus.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;servicebus-namespace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the namespace of the service bus.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;resource-type%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>queue</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>topics</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>notificationhubs</languageKeyword> depending on your needs.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;resource-type%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>queue</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>topics</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>notificationhubs</languageKeyword> depending on your needs.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;entity%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the service bus entity.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;entity%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the service bus entity.

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for deployments of Virtual Machines:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for deployments of Virtual Machines:

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloud-service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;availability-set%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the availability set.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloud-service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;availability-set%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the availability set.

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for a server that is running a website:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for a server that is running a website:

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for a logical web application:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for a logical web application:

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace that contains the websites, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;website%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the website.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace that contains the websites, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;website%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the website.

trans-unit.source: The following format is used to define the resource path for deployments of Mobile Services:
trans-unit.target: The following format is used to define the resource path for deployments of Mobile Services:

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobile service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobile service%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the frequency of data collection.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the frequency of data collection.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is set to 5 minutes (<languageKeyword>PT5M</languageKeyword>).
trans-unit.target: Typically, this is set to 5 minutes (<languageKeyword>PT5M</languageKeyword>).

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the metrics from multiple instances are combined.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how the metrics from multiple instances are combined.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the range of time in which instance data is collected.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the range of time in which instance data is collected.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the data that is collected should be combined over time.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how the data that is collected should be combined over time.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the operator that is used to evaluate the metric.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the operator that is used to evaluate the metric.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the percentage of usage that triggers the scaling operation.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the percentage of usage that triggers the scaling operation.

trans-unit.source: Specifies parameters for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies parameters for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specified whether the scaling action increases or decreases the number of instances that are used.
trans-unit.target: Specified whether the scaling action increases or decreases the number of instances that are used.

trans-unit.source: A default profile has 2 rules, one for increasing instances and one for decreasing instances.
trans-unit.target: A default profile has 2 rules, one for increasing instances and one for decreasing instances.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of action that should occur.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the type of action that should occur.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this must be set to <languageKeyword>ChangeCount</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Currently, this must be set to <languageKeyword>ChangeCount</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of instances that are involved in the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of instances that are involved in the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: This value must be 1 or greater.
trans-unit.target: This value must be 1 or greater.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of minutes to wait between the last scaling action and the next scale action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of minutes to wait between the last scaling action and the next scale action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the frequency and schedule for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the frequency and schedule for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how often the scaling action should occur.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how often the scaling action should occur.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scheduling constraints of the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the scheduling constraints of the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a specific date for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a specific date for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time zone for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time zone for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the start time of the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the start time of the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the end time of the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the end time of the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scheduling constraints of the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the scheduling constraints of the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time zone for the schedule parameters.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time zone for the schedule parameters.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a comma separated list of the days of in schedule.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a comma separated list of the days of in schedule.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hours when the schedule should run.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the hours when the schedule should run.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minutes of the hour when the schedule should run.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the minutes of the hour when the schedule should run.

trans-unit.source: Only one value is supported for this element.
trans-unit.target: Only one value is supported for this element.

trans-unit.source: You can only schedule an action for once per hour.
trans-unit.target: You can only schedule an action for once per hour.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Management Portal to update the settings for automatic scaling of your application.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the Management Portal to update the settings for automatic scaling of your application.
